title: Venetian Crab Salad
introduction: Venetian Crab Salad is a delicate and elegant starter that takes inspiration from Venice's wine bars, known as bacari. This delicious dish features large crabs called granseole, often served atop crostini or presented in radicchio cups at formal restaurants. Its fresh flavors make it a refreshing choice for a summer meal.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pound fresh crab meat, picked over
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the parsley, oil, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste. Add the crab meat and stir well. Taste for seasoning.
Arrange the radicchio leaves on serving plates. Scoop the salad onto the leaves. Serve immediately.
